public.error.error_404_message: 我们似乎找不到您要查找的页面, 请重试或返回上一页.
public.error.error_408_message: 你的网络好像暂停服务了⛱️. 请尝试重新连接你的 Wi-Fi 或刷新页面, 看看是否有帮助.
public.error.error_400_message: 您的请求似乎在传输过程中出现问题. 请仔细检查 URL 或重试.
public.error.error_401_message: 看来您正试图无权限潜入. 请登录或提供正确凭证, 我们将很乐意为您开门.
public.error.error_403_message: 此区域似乎禁止进入. 请咨询您的管理员, 确认您是否有权访问.
public.error.error_429_message: 您发送请求的速度太快了, 我们无法跟上! 我们暂时暂停了, 以便喘口气. 请稍等片刻, 稍后再试.
public.error.error_503_message: 我们的开发人员正在努力提升您的使用体验. 请稍事休息, 喝杯咖啡 ☕️, 您的旅程即将继续.
public.error.error_500_message: 我们的服务器在尝试处理您的请求时出现故障. 我们正在处理!  在此期间, 请随时刷新或稍后再回来.
public.error.error_502_message: 我们与其他服务器通信时遇到了一些问题. 这不是您的问题,  而是我们的问题. 请稍等片刻, 我们会尽快修复.
public.login.description1: 立即体验无忧虑库存管理系统的便捷.
public.login.description2: 您的库存得到完善的管理.
public.navbar.logout_message_desc: 您确定要退出该帐户吗?
public.order.delete_order_message_desc: 您确定要删除所选订单吗? 一旦操作将无法撤回.
public.order.cancel_order_message_desc: 您确定要取消此订单吗? 所有商品将返回库存, 不会影响销售.
public.order.cancel_order_redeemed_messa: 您确定要取消此订单吗? 已兑换的商品/奖励将不予退还. 普通商品将返回库存, 不会影响销售.

public.order.redeem_reward_message1: 您确定要为该客户兑换所选奖励
public.order.replace_redeem_reward_messa: 您确定要兑换并用所选奖励替换当前应用的奖励
public.order.replaced_amount_discount_me: 此订单当前应用的奖励已被替换为 'RM :discount_rate 折扣'.
public.order.redeem_amount_discount_mess: 'RM :discount_rate 折扣' 已应用于此订单.
public.order.replaced_percent_discount_m: 此订单当前应用的奖励已被替换为 ':discount_rate% 折扣'.
public.order.redeem_percent_discount_mes: ':discount_rate% 折扣' 已应用于此订单.

public.order.check_in_guest: 您已成功将顾客登记至 ':table_no'.
public.order.not_allowed_keep_desc: :count 件产品将从保留物品列表中删除.
public.order.max_keep_qty: 您已达到最大保留数量
public.order.merge_reminder: 合并桌台时, 来自单独的账单将会与合并桌台设为一张账单。
public.order.existing_customer: 您要合并的桌台上已经有一位顾客
public.order.choose_customer_stay: 请选择桌台合并后谁将继续做为初始登记.
public.order.both_applied_rewards_remove: 两个订单所应用的奖励将被删除, 但您随时可以在付款时重新应用它.
public.order.splt_applied_rewards_remove: 请注意, 拆分账单将使任何已应用的奖励失效, 因为奖励不能与拆分账单一起使用.
public.order.reassign_message: 您想将主桌台中的订单重新分配到 未合并的桌台中吗?
public.order.transfer_option_message: 您想如何转移这张桌台的订单？
public.order.unlock_table_message: 您的购物车中还有商品！您想解锁桌子还是留下来?
public.shift.no_shift_message: 您的轮班记录将显示在这里.
public.shift.no_shift_opened_message: 轻松关注商店的收银台班次!
public.shift.enter_initial_cash: 请在收银机中输入初始现金金额以开始您的轮班
public.shift.enter_current_cash: 请输入您现金抽屉中的当前现金金额.

public.shift.pay_reason: 存入 / 支出金额的原因.
public.shift.shift_pay_history: 您当前班次存入 / 支出的历史记录.
validation.accepted_if: The :attribute must be accepted when :other is :value.
validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute must only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute must only contain letters and numbers.
validation.ascii: The :attribute must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
validation.between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
validation.between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.
validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation.declined_if: The :attribute must be declined when :other is :value.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.doesnt_end_with: The :attribute may not end with one of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute may not start with one of the following: :values.
validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.ends_with: The :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
validation.gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
validation.gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.
validation.gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
validation.gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value.
validation.gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value characters.
validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation.lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
validation.lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
validation.lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.
validation.lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
validation.lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value.
validation.lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value characters.
validation.mac_address: The :attribute must be a valid MAC address.
validation.max.array: The :attribute must not have more than :max items.
validation.max.file: The :attribute must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation.max.numeric: The :attribute must not be greater than :max.
validation.max.string: The :attribute must not be greater than :max characters.
validation.max_digits: The :attribute must not have more than :max digits.
validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
validation.min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
validation.min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.
validation.min_digits: The :attribute must have at least :min digits.
validation.multiple_of: The :attribute must be a multiple of :value.
validation.password.letters: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
validation.password.mixed: The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
validation.password.numbers: The :attribute must contain at least one number.
validation.password.symbols: The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
validation.password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.
validation.prohibited_if: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is :value.
validation.prohibited_unless: The :attribute field is prohibited unless :other is in :values.
validation.prohibits: The :attribute field prohibits :other from being present.
validation.required_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain entries for: :values.
validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation.required_if_accepted: The :attribute field is required when :other is accepted.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values.
validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid timezone.
validation.url: The :attribute must be a valid URL.
validation.ulid: The :attribute must be a valid ULID.
validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
